flavorText: The ground cracked and unleashed a thousand years of history at once.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Boden brach auf und entfesselte tausend Jahre Geschichte in einem Augenblick.
foreignData.name: Vergangenheit ernten
foreignData.text: Bringe X zufällig bestimmte Karten aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Schicke Vergangenheit ernten ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: De repente, la tierra se abrió y liberó un milenio de historia.
foreignData.name: Cosechar el pasado
foreignData.text: Regresa X cartas al azar de tu cementerio a tu mano. Exilia Cosechar el pasado.

foreignData.flavorText: La terre se fissura et libéra mille ans d'histoire en une seconde.
foreignData.name: Fenaison du passé
foreignData.text: Renvoyez X cartes choisies au hasard depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. Exilez la Fenaison du passé.

foreignData.flavorText: Il terreno si spaccò, scatenando un migliaio di anni di storia in un istante.
foreignData.name: Raccogliere il Passato
foreignData.text: Riprendi in mano X carte a caso dal tuo cimitero. Esilia Raccogliere il Passato.

foreignData.flavorText: 裂けた大地から、千年もの歴史が一気に噴出した。
foreignData.name: 過去の刈り取り
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地からカードＸ枚を無作為に選んであなたの手札に戻す。過去の刈り取りを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 대지가 무너져내리며 천년 묵은 역사를 단숨에 꺼내놓았다.
foreignData.name: 과거 수확
foreignData.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 카드 X 장을 무작위로 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 과거 수확을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: O chão rachou e liberou mil anos de história de uma só vez.
foreignData.name: Colher o Passado
foreignData.text: Devolva X cards aleatoriamente de seu cemitério para sua mão. Exile Colher o Passado.

foreignData.flavorText: Земля раскололась и за один раз выпустила на волю тысячу лет истории.
foreignData.name: Жатва Прошлого
foreignData.text: Верните X случайно выбранных карт из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Изгоните Жатву Прошлого.

foreignData.flavorText: 大地开裂，一时间释放出千年的历史。
foreignData.name: 收割过往
foreignData.text: 随机将X张牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。放逐收割过往。

foreignData.flavorText: 大地開裂，一時間釋放出千年的歷史。
foreignData.name: 收割過往
foreignData.text: 隨機將X張牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。放逐收割過往。

name: Reap the Past
originalText: Return X cards at random from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Reap the Past.

rulings.text: No player may take actions between the time the cards are chosen at random and the time they’re returned to your hand.
Reap the Past is still on the stack while you return cards to your hand, so it can’t return itself.
All players get to see which cards you chose at random as they’re returned to your hand.
If X is greater than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard, you simply return your entire graveyard to your hand.

text: Return X cards at random from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Reap the Past.
